Articles.Content:
How do you get it to attach at all three parts so it doesn't fall apart at launch?

http://www.speedyshare.com/Me5vA/Ion-Powered-Space-Probe-Extreme.craft

Edited August 26, 2013 by Profound
We need to see it to help you rather than just fix it ourselves. You learn more from that and are less likely to repeat the error, whatever it may be.
Use mediafire to upload files, cannot download from there without installing crapware.
Just click on that "big link wording" no need to install crapware. Anyway I'm checking the file now.

I haven't download it for the reasons above, but it seems like your rocket is falling apart because you want one part to attach to more than one other part. Unfortunately, if this is the case, it is not possible. KSP does not allow for part "trees." In other words, it will only attach one part to another part with out attaching to other two to the same part. The one exception to this rule is strut connectors. You can strut the two that don't attach to the part you want them to attach to. I know it is unrealistic and a pain in the butt some times, but that is just how the game is programed.

Here is my fix for your craft. Removed an stray tri-coupler that was clipping and added struts so it would not topple. Also fixed some fuel lines that caused catastrophic failure after the first stage.

Got it to space, but you do not have any significant SAS or RCS to control the craft outside of the atmosphere. Add some reaction wheels or RCS and you will be able to get a good orbit.

Sorry wrong post.

Edited August 25, 2013 by Sirine
Sorry, wrong post

Ok. fixed...here are the file.

Since "abihoooo" already give you the fixed. I think I will just give you the lifter.

Warning! It fly pretty fast. Remember to make your turn.

Ok. fixed...here are the file.

Since "abihoooo" already give you the fixed. I think I will just give you the lifter.

Warning! It fly pretty fast. Remember to make your turn.

Your spacecraft was wonderful, but unfortunately I need something with a little more oomph to get to jool and I ran out of xenon after getting to the first moon. So I upped the level of extreme to the probe. (I probably need to add more engines to it)

And I tried to add a middle stage to the rocket...but... it falls apart at launch. I don't understand what causes this. I kind of got the last one, because only one part was staying connected and it was off balanced. But how do you make stronger without like it getting connected and not separating?

http://www./?y4tb1w11j1o14v9

Here u go. You might need some skill to did this..

Download Here

1) Press 9 "TWICE" to disable the "gimbal". Before lift-off. (Indication of the antenna open)

2) The last 2 "Orange Tank" due to too long, you should make your turn...SLOWLY.

Note: Your nuke rocket at the Center...Problem, do some clip-on for you. Remove it if you don't like the look of it.

Edited August 25, 2013 by Sirine

Here u go. You might need some skill to did this..

Download Here

1) Press 9 "TWICE" to disable the "gimbal". Before lift-off. (Indication of the antenna open)

2) The last 2 "Orange Tank" due to too long, you should make your turn...SLOWLY.

Note: Your nuke rocket at the Center...Problem, do some clip-on for you. Remove it if you don't like the look of it.

This works perfectly! Thank you. The antenna falling off at the start pretty funny. I think I might add a lot of them randomly to rockets from now on.

What was the problem with the nuke rocket? Did I need to lower it a little or something?
